alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Huron; Richland; Seneca (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 01 at 8:02PM EDT until June 01 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Richland County in north central Ohio... Southern Huron County in north central Ohio... Southeastern Seneca County in northwestern Ohio... Northern Crawford County in north central Ohio... * Until 900 PM EDT. * At 802 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Bloomville, or 10 miles southeast of Tiffin, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Mansfield, Shelby, Willard, New London, Plymouth, New Washington, Bloomville, Chatfield, Greenwich, Attica, Benton, Tiro, Shenandoah and Olivesburg. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
